code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import{followActionCreator,setUserActionCreator,unfollowActionCreator}from'../redux/friends-reducer';import AsideFriends from'./Aside_Friends';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{FriendsData:state.FriendsPage.FriendsData};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{follow:function follow(userid){dispatch(followActionCreator(userid));},unfollow:function unfollow(userid){dispatch(unfollowActionCreator(userid));},setUsers:function setUsers(users){dispatch(setUserActionCreator(users));}};};var FriendsContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(AsideFriends);export default FriendsContainer;
